player_news.trend_summary: Dean Huijsen, currently a Bournemouth defender, has debuted for the Spanish national team in the Nations League quarter-finals against the Netherlands, a decision met with a hostile reception in Rotterdam. Amidst transfer speculation linking him to Liverpool and Newcastle, Huijsen has expressed his preferred destination, while a new Premier League club has entered the race for the sought-after player.

player_news.trend_summary: Mikel Merino etched his name into Spanish football folklore, scoring a dramatic stoppage-time equalizer against the Netherlands in the UEFA Nations League quarter-finals, rescuing a draw for the holders. Amidst the celebrations, Merino also revealed his preferred playing position, stating "I never back down."
